title: iMAC 21 MID 2011
message: Hello, I installed the solid state hard drive but there are problems with the fan, I read in the forum a solution for imac 27 "taking the 11 pin sata connector to ground, I wanted to ask if the same applies to the imac 21", and any recommendations and if you know because it works well thank you

title: iMAC 21 MID 2011
message: it works on 21inch 2011 models as well.. just solder pin 11 to ground (i usually take apart the SSD, and solder pin 11 to an adjacent ground-pin with some solder-blob, and close the SSD up again) and you should be good to go
